Goal of Economy MTA

Goal of Wealth MTA

1 You may pay 10 Money. If you do, achieve this goal. This threshold increases by 5 for each other goal you’ve achieved this game.

3 3 Goal Goal
1 You may pay 5 actions. If you do, achieve this goal. This threshold increases by 2 for each other goal you’ve achieved this game.
Goal of Filth MTA

1 You may void 10 cards with cost {2} or less from your hand and wheel. If you do, achieve this goal. This threshold increases by 5 for each other goal you’ve achieved this game.

Oracle MTA

Bank MTA
4 4 Normal Normal
1 +1 Action Draw a card. Void any number of coins from your hand. If the number of coins you voided was — 0 — Create a Scrap Coin copy in your hand. 1 — Create a Half Coin copy in your hand. 2 — Create a Copper Coin copy in your hand. 3 — Create a Silver Coin copy in your hand. 4 — Create a Gold Coin copy in your hand. 5 — Create a Platinum Coin copy in your hand. Scrap Coin Half Coin Copper Coin Silver Coin Gold Coin Platinum Coin
